TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EncryptedType extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive.

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从其表示的抽象基类的类和派生。The class represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive. 这两个类包含实际加密的数据或 XML 加密中的密钥信息。These two classes contain the actual encrypted data or key information in XML encryption. 若要符合 XML 加密标准，应使用这两个派生的类。To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use these two derived classes. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅[XML 加密语法和处理版本 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information on XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素是必需的元素提供的加密的数据的 XML 加密中。The `` element is a required element in XML encryption that provides the encrypted data. 它都必须包含 base64 编码的文本的加密八位字节序列属性，或提供到外部位置包含加密的八位字节序列使用的引用属性。It must either contain the encrypted octet sequence as the base64-encoded text of the property, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted octet sequence using the property. 有关此元素的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about this element, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性描述加密数据的编码。This property describes the encoding of the encrypted data. 例如，如果加密的数据的 base64 编码 PNG，无法指定编码为。For example, if the encrypted data is a base64-encoded PNG, the encoding could be specified as ''. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 随后此示例将显示的各种属性类到控制台。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks ``是可选元素，它描述应用于加密数据的加密算法。The `` is an optional element that describes the encryption algorithm applied to the encrypted data. 如果该元素不存在，必须由接收方已知的加密算法或解密将失败。If the element is absent, the encryption algorithm must be known by the recipient or decryption will fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. summary.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密数据的媒体类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the media type of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MimeType`属性是描述加密数据的媒体类型的可选属性。The `MimeType` attribute is an optional attribute that describes the media type of the encrypted data. 此属性的值是定义的值的字符串[RFC 2045:多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 第 1 部分：Internet 消息正文的格式](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt)。The value of this attribute is a string with values defined by [RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt). 例如，如果加密的数据是 base64 编码 PNG`Encoding`属性将为和`MimeType`将是 image/png。For example, if the data that is encrypted is a base64-encoded PNG, the `Encoding` attribute would be '' and the `MimeType` would be 'image/png'. 此属性是可选的和未验证`MimeType`信息是必需的。This attribute is optional and no validation of the `MimeType` information is required. 该属性不指示加密应用程序必须任何其他处理。The attribute does not indicate that the encryption application must do any additional processing. 请注意，此信息可能不是必需的如果它已绑定到中的标识符`Type`属性。Note that this information may not be necessary if it is already bound to the identifier in the `Type` attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 随后此示例将显示的各种属性类到控制台。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/vb/sample.vb#1)]

public: virtual property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Type : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密数据的文本形式的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the text form of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Type`属性是标识有关加密内容的文本形式的类型信息的可选属性。The `Type` attribute is an optional attribute that identifies type information about the text form of the encrypted content. 尽管都是可选的这是一个重要特性，用于在强制处理中所述[处理规则：解密](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)（第 4.2 部分） 的 XML 加密语法和处理规范 (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。While optional, this is an important attribute and is used in mandatory processing described in [Processing Rules: Decryption](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/) (section 4.2) of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). 如果``元素包含的数据类型`'element'`或元素`'content'`，并替换，XML 文档中的数据，强烈建议`Type`提供属性。If the `` element contains data of type `'element'` or element `'content'`, and replaces that data in an XML document, it is strongly recommended that the `Type` attribute be provided. 如果没有此信息，尝试解密信息的应用程序将无法自动还原到其原始文本格式的 XML 文档。Without this information, the application attempting to decrypt the information will be unable to automatically restore the XML document to its original text form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]
